casebody.data:
Normandy L. HUNTER, Respondent,
v.
Travis S. HUNTER, Appellant. WD 82142 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: June 18, 2019 George Smith, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. John Roodhouse, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: Thomas N. Chapman, P.J., Mark D. Pfeiffer, and Cynthia L. Martin, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Travis Hunter appeals the judgment of the Boone County Circuit Court, denying his motion to modify child support. He argues that the circuit court erred (1) in failing to attach or incorporate a Form 14 in its judgment, and (2) in calculating his monthly gross income. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
